Key Match Events: Fox recorded a game-high 29 points and 10 assists
Kevin Huerter backed Fox with 22 points
Domantas Sabonis recorded a double-double with 11 points and team-high 10 rebounds
The Kings outscored the Suns 29-14 in the final nine minutes
A 12-0 burst featuring 3-pointers by Huerter and Keon Ellis blew the game open at 110-90
Pre-Game Insights: Despite injuries, both teams were short-handed
The Suns were without Kevin Durant and Bradley Beal
The Kings were without Malik Monk and lost DeMar DeRozan to a sore back
The Kings beat the Suns a second straight time after winning 127-118 in overtime in Phoenix on Sunday
Post-Match Reflections: Fox expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win
The coach highlighted the victory as a crucial step toward the championship
